title: Ablation and laparoscopic adrenalectomy: Balancing efficacy and safety in the treatment of benign adrenal gland tumors: A systematic review and meta-analysis
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Benjamin Skribek, Anett Szabó, Júlia Ács, Péter Hegyi, Péter Mátrai, Péter Nyirády, Nándor Ács, Attila Majoros, Pál Ákos Deák
